name: SSF6
title: Site-Specific Factor 6
subtitle: Adenoid Cystic Carcinoma - Presence of Basaloid Pattern
notes:
**Note 1:**  Code only for cases diagnosed as adenoid cystic carcinoma, histology code 8200/3.  

**Note 2:** Use code 987 for all other histologies. Use code 998 if no pathologic examination of primary site.
rows: Basaloid pattern not present in adenoid cystic carcinoma
Basaloid pattern present in adenoid cystic carcinoma
Not applicable, histology not adenoid cystic carcinoma
Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
No pathologic examination of primary site

Unknown or no information
Not documented in patient record
